translations: n.（男子的）成年，成年期；男子气概；<文>一国的男子；<文>阴茎；<古>人性

phrs.translation: 男子气概, 成年期, 男人本色
成年男子选举权, 男公民选举权, 翻译

sentences.sentence: Her new-found power was a threat to his manhood.
sentences.translation: 她最近具有的能力对他的男子汉气概是个威胁。

sentences.sentence: The nation's manhood died on the battlefields of World War I.
sentences.translation: 这个国家的男子都在第一次世界大战的战场上牺牲了。

sentences.sentence: When in manhood, he goes erect on two feet and when in old age, he supports his tottering legs with a stick.
sentences.translation: 成年时，他用两只脚直立，年老时，他用一根棍子支撑着蹒跚的双腿。
